title: Network Error
body: Every single game I've started today has given me the network error message. I'm unable to connect until everyone else already has loaded in. My internet is working fine. with everything else.

replies.body: Your internet might be fine, but it seems like your connection is getting blocked from reaching the game server.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings and test it in a custom game.  If the issue persists, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Stick to customs for now to test until everything is good to go!
